author: Staff Reporter
text:
Poongothai (55) of North Street in Karunkadal was allegedly beaten to death by her husband P. Moses (57) on Tuesday.

The incident occurred near Sathankulam Taluk Office. Moses, a casual labourer addicted to alcohol, often used to pick quarrels with Poongothai suspecting her fidelity, sources said.

Irked over this, Poongothai threatened that she would file a police complaint against him.

Moses was dissuading her from doing so.

When Poongothai tried to go to the police station to lodge a complaint, Moses assaulted her with a wooden log.

She sustained head injuries and died, sources added.

The body was taken to Sathankulam Government Hospital for post-mortem. Based on a complaint lodged by Sathrak (21), son of the deceased, Sathankulam police have filed a case under Section-302 of the Indian Penal Code.
title: Woman beaten to death by husband
